dict.string: BeeSpeak needs microphone access to record voice notes and commands during hive inspections. This allows you to use Pocket Inspection Mode hands-free.
BeeSpeak needs camera access to capture photos during hive inspections and to scan QR codes for quick hive identification.
BeeSpeak needs photo library access to select photos to attach to hive inspections.
BeeSpeak needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
